post.body: I've been living with my own most hated FB photo for a while, so I hear you. Now if the photo was incriminating...
LOL. "But baby, I really am a vegetarian! That facebook photo of me eating a burger was photoshopped!"
This is true. It was a post on social media etiquette (that said something similar) that got me thinking about it in the 1st place.
@GeekyChic @ahrycyk I might have to do that. But doesn't the owner of the photo get a notice when you untag yourself?
I ain't mad, especially since after Friday, I'm off for the rest of the year. :D So don't pay me any mind, lol.
Good morning. Send prayers and positive thoughts your way! I hope everything turns out ok.
There's a twitter account too - @healemru. Reading his story has convinced me to join the Bone Marrow Registry.
Thank you! :D
I'm ok - less mad, but things are still kind of tense here. How are you?
Different - definitely more dance-y vs. R&B. But I like it! I <3 her voice.
Me too! I took my Mom to see it for Mother's Day last year. It's one of my favorite shows, and albums!
I know, right? As if any of his behavior is goning to stop the scrutiny of his department...
I'm not into Avatar, so I haven't. But considering Hollywodd's track record...I can imagine.
@havi Thank you. :D Now to go do something futuristic and stuff...
Oh, no doubt. I have nothing against the suits themselves, just the attitudes of the men in them. :)
A plugin to customize the admin panel color scheme. I'm not feeling the grey or the blue, and i figure I can't be the only one.
You got a twitpic, and a crackberry. I'm not seeing the problem here. ;)
It's cool so far - lots of neat little features that will make managing my blog much easier. I just wish it wasn't all grey!
:P I just woke up! lol See, this is why @tgrundy is on the job. I haven't tweeted about it in a bit, so I will. After coffee. :D
Thank you for the group promotion. Your check is in the mail. :)
Thanks. A/t the comments it'll be going to print soon, so I'm looking forward to getting a copy. :)
I just can't get around her voice. On record she sounds like she's chewing the notes. In the vids I was watching, she was amazing.
Which is exactly my fear! Please no remakes of dancehall songs. Please no using Biggie's beats. Please no Harajuku girls.
I'm trying to hold on...and if they hit Bmore I might see them live, we'll see.
This is true. Of all things, he apparently still has his reflexes.
You, me, and everyone we now. I wouldn't be surprised if someone casts that show in bronze!
This si true...if I don't pull my hair out first, lol.
I always like @chrisguillebeau's take on it - he works with is ADD-ness, switching projects at will and not feeling guilty. :)
I started with "I Choose" by india.arie, and then had the iTunes Genius thingy do the rest. :) It's been a good mix so far.
Sweet! Thank you! *off to check it out*
Thank you. I work on the Business side of a new site development at work, and IE6 has been giving the developers fits! lol
D'oh! That was supposed to be a text msg to @japanegro, and not a tweet to the whole world! Sorry guys. :)
QOTD: If someone tagged you in a facebook photo that you thought was incredibly unflattering, would you ask them to remove the tag?
This is a day tailor made for sleeping, but alas! Here I am, trapped in a world of flourescent lighting and grey everything.
Welcome new followers: @JD_Photography, @shtikl, @GlennGrundberg
Thank you to @camiseta, @SpellSpace, @zaizab, @DanTanner, @mlwhall, @CreativeSage
Hi new followers: @phaiku, @totspot, @IRazedEden, @yellowgoatetsy, @tiabel, @JonathanGunson, @JoyceAnthony
:D The iTunes free video this week is from Robyn. Does anyone else remember "Show Me Love"?
<--is wondering why her API count is maxed out, when she hasn't been on but a fw minutes. AGAIN. Is there a way to see my API requests?
That was so cool! Broadway shows always make me wish I could sing, but I'm as bad as the girl in the show when it comes to that. :)
Pleasure to meet @LMAshton
Hello to @ShawnChrys, @PhilHarnish, @rafnie
Most Improbable Lil' John Mashup ever: http://bit.ly/NXCY I need to play some music if I'm ever going to get this shit outta my head...
Reading: "Orlando Sentinel - NASA has become a transition problem for Obama" ( http://tinyurl.com/6kuht9 )
New live action Dragonball trailer: http://bit.ly/eeli Dear Chow Yun Fat: WHY WHY WHY? You out-acted Jodi Foster, for chrissake!
Chat soon @flamezgeek, @jen_renee
Chat soon @freekii, @Rex7, @KeyserSoze_, @dianewb, @ktdydd, @Mark_Terrell, @beautybyella, @webtrepreneur, @thegiantsden
Cool people: @TennisExpress, @Scribbit, @MistiRose, @annajanek, @freeseoinfo, @Who2Follow
Eating at a Cosi for the 1st time. Sitting near 5 almost interchangeable men in suits. Thinking: they are the past, & I am the future.
Nice to meet @webgames, @manifestmmind, @theblkdali
Hmmm...I think I might be writing my 1st wp plugin this weekend. I don't see a good reason why I shouldn't...
Looking through the Gravatar options. I've been meaning to do some renovations to my blog's format, and what better time than now?
I like that I can expand and collapse Dashboard items with a click - makes organizing it much nicer. But I need some color!
RT @baltimoresun: Obama and Biden are making a stop in Baltimore on their way to D.C. via train for the inauguration. http://is.gd/bMGF
Still trying to relax enough to drop my shoulders. Will probably take another few days. Gpt a busy day ahead! G/M Tweeters!
Welcome @gamelim07
Thank you to @Vhedot, @gamelim03
Carl Brandon Society blog http://tinyurl.com/63q9kv "Dedicated to improving the visibility of pplof color in the speculative genres" #blck
Carl Brandon Society blog: "Bayou;" fantasy/horror comic by Jeremy Love and Patrick Morgan http://tinyurl.com/5uaujy #blck
Thanks to @GuyHagen, @ashrafism, @stubborn
I just got a msg on OkCupid asking me if I've ever had a "submissive platonic friendship". I'm not even sure what that *means*.
Her blog banner...*smh*. We get it. You're retro. This is a little much: http://www.solangemusic.com/default.aspx
Watching y/t videos of Solange. I wish she sang on the album like she's singing in some of these user-recorded vids. Her voice has settled.
"cute puppy whistle" = both the cutest and *strangest* thing I have seen on the Internet in a bit: http://bit.ly/U6Ze
No Doubt is a) recording a new album and b) going on tour in '09. I'd be more excited if I hadn't been so disappointed w/Gwen's solo albums.
The last panel of this made me laugh - "How to Stay Young -- Basic Instructions" http://basicinstructions.net/?p=851
Sometimes I wish I wasn't so ADD.
If I keep this up I'm going to need a tablet...and another monitor...and a desk, lol.
I've downloaded GIMP (thank goodness for open source software) and I'm reading through the help materials.
Good morning, I mean afternoon, tweeters. How are you today? My quest for a pretty and functional wordpress blog continues. :)
#lastfm #love Golden by Jill Scott http://bit.ly/4uG7jC
Ok, my eyes are starting cross. I have my theme (yay!) but now I need to make it look pretty (boo!). That is a task for tomorrow. Goodnight!
#lastfm #love Feel Like Makin' Love by D'Angelo http://bit.ly/MLhg
#lastfm #love Love Is You by Chrisette Michele http://bit.ly/ieqaQ
#lastfm #love Love by Musiq http://bit.ly/QBHJ
#lastfm #love Strength, Courage, & Wisdom by India.Arie http://bit.ly/Q9cF
#lastfm #love Soul Sista by Bilal http://bit.ly/5thR
#lastfm #love FAR AWAY (Album Version) by Kindred the Family Soul http://bit.ly/49u6st
#lastfm #love Best Of Me by Chrisette Michele http://bit.ly/FWE
Wow. Doing this step-by-step makes it so much easier to see how the css, php, and xhtml fit together. I should have done this sooner!
